strapiPost.title: New Drop In Sport At The Jones Center
strapiPost.content:
Starting Jan. 2, a new open sport will be offered at The Jones Center.

  • Sporty: Curling sessions will be open every Sunday after the opening day from 3-4:45p and staffed by members of the Northwest Arkansas Curling Club. 
  • Come play: The drop-in curling fun will be $8 a person and is accessible to all ages. If you donâ€™t know how to play, there will be people more than willing to teach you. No registration is required. 

For more information, call 479.925.2628.
